columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The resource ID.

columns.name: connectivity_status
columns.description: Represents the connectivity status of the connected cluster.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the connected cluster resource.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource.

columns.name: agent_public_key_certificate
columns.description: Base64 encoded public certificate used by the agent to do the initial handshake to the backend services in Azure.

columns.name: agent_version
columns.description: Version of the agent running on the connected cluster resource.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The timestamp of resource creation (UTC).

columns.name: created_by
columns.description: The identity that created the resource.

columns.name: created_by_type
columns.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

columns.name: distribution
columns.description: The Kubernetes distribution running on this connected cluster.

columns.name: infrastructure
columns.description: The infrastructure on which the Kubernetes cluster represented by this connected cluster is running on.

columns.name: kubernetes_version
columns.description: The Kubernetes version of the connected cluster resource.

columns.name: last_connectivity_time
columns.description: Time representing the last instance when heart beat was received from the cluster.

columns.name: last_modified_at
columns.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC).

columns.name: last_modified_by
columns.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

columns.name: last_modified_by_type
columns.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

columns.name: location
columns.description: Location of the resource.

columns.name: managed_identity_certificate_expiration_time
columns.description: Expiration time of the managed identity certificate.

columns.name: offering
columns.description: Connected cluster offering.

columns.name: total_core_count
columns.description: Number of CPU cores present in the connected cluster resource.

columns.name: total_node_count
columns.description: Number of nodes present in the connected cluster resource.

columns.name: extensions
columns.description: The extensions of the connected cluster.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the connected cluster.
